DOC.detailed_description: Phase 1 study successfully complete . The result Phase 1 indicate combination high-frequency ( 50Hz ) long duration 6 minute ( deliver eight 45-sec bout ) WBV associate large change spasticity ( measure pendulum test ) . It also seem feasible WBV would serve prim stimulus increase responsiveness training . The goal Phase 2 understand add WBV physical therapy/exercise training result decrease spasticity improve walking ability compare train alone . Two different dos WBV , short dose long dose test .
DOC.criteria: Be currently participate Shepherd STEP program Beyond Therapy spinal cord injury least 6 month duration . age 16 65 year old . able stand least one minute use upper extremity balance . able move one leg least small amount use whatever device helpful . least mild spasticity affect low extremity muscle . able transfer sit stand require moderate assistance one person . able understand provide consent You may participate use prescription medication , include baclofen pump control spasticity , dosage stable . progressive potentially progressive spinal lesion , include degenerative , progressive vascular disorder spine and/or spinal cord . neurologic level spinal level T12 history cardiovascular irregularity problem follow instruction orthopedic problem would limit participation protocol ( e.g . knee hip flexion contracture great 10 degree ) .
